title: All the American, Canadian, and Mexican Cyclists Racing in the 2025 Giro d’Italia
content:
Del Toro, Gee, McNulty headline a 7-rider North American contingent chasing pink, stage wins, and glory at the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at All the American, Canadian, and Mexican Cyclists Racing in the 2025 Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: ahood
